author: cbs8
title: Mitch Laretzs New Book The Boys from Bakersfield is a Look into a Scary American Future
text:
Recent release “The Boys from Bakersfield” from Page Publishing author Mitch Laretz is the story of spilled blood and sacrifices in unforgiving world of 2055.
(PRWEB) October 13, 2015
Mitch Laretz, a dedicated writer and author, has completed his new book “The Boys from Bakersfield”: a riveting and potent look at a dystopian future in the United States.
“A vicious tyrant has secured the wealthiest citizens in Utopian cities, while banishing the majority into crumbling neighborhoods to fend for themselves. These poor souls struggle to survive, as their own government has cut them off from all technology and resources,” Laretz said. “Two 17-year-olds from Bakersfield, California named Tommy and Monty are part of the deprived majority. Just when life had become intolerable for these best friends, a glimmer of hope arrives in the form of an old man with a purpose.”
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Laretz’s book is a fascinating tale of Tommy and Monty’s plans to join an army, which intends to overthrow the very government that has inflicted the suffering.
Readers who wish to experience this gripping work can purchase “The Boys from Bakersfield” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Page Publishing knows that authors need to be free to create - not bogged down with complicated business issues like eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, insurance, shipping, taxes and the like. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13013256.htm
